firstCard.title: Networking function
firstCard.description: You can use the networking function to network with other actors or organizations and collect your contacts in lists.

secondCard.title: Matching function
secondCard.description: Suitable projects, organizations and actors are suggested to you via an algorithm.

thirdCard.title: Interaction
thirdCard.description: You can react to existing content such as projects or posts via interactions (such as liking or commenting).

fourthCard.title: Create own events
fourthCard.description: As a STEM actor, you can create your own events and manage the participants.

fifthCard.title: Add yourself to organizations
fifthCard.description: You can add yourself to an organization and no longer have to have a team member add you.

sixthCard.title: MINT-Campus connection
sixthCard.description: See who is creating courses, which courses are being taken by others and show which courses you have completed.

firstCard.title: Filter function
firstCard.description: You can use the filter to search for specific criteria within the overview pages of profiles, organizations, events or projects.

secondCard.title: Language setting: English
secondCard.description: With the expanded language settings, we enable a larger group of actors to use the community platform well.

thirdCard.title: Dashboard
thirdCard.description: After logging in, you can use the dashboard to clearly see all the platform's functions at a glance and be informed about news.

firstCard.title: Profile & organization profile
firstCard.description: You introduce yourself to the STEM community using your profile and by creating your organization with its team members.

secondCard.title: Eventmanagement
secondCard.description: Browse for suitable MINTvernetzt events, register and see who has also registered for the event.

thirdCard.title: Search
thirdCard.description: You can use the search function to search for profiles, organizations, events, projects and keywords.

fourthCard.title: MINT-ID
fourthCard.description: In order to be able to easily switch between the two offers MINTvernetzt and MINT-Campus, there is the MINT-ID, with which you can use both platforms (single sign-in).

fifthCard.title: Landing page
fifthCard.description: The landing page informs new members about the content and usage figures of the community platform.
